comments.comments_text: The corner from Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) is hurriedly cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: Leo Ostigard (Napoli) gets to a rebound inside the six-yard box and produces a header. He manages to put the ball into the roof of the net, and thus alter the score to 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

comments.comments_text: Matteo Politano (Napoli) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety. Napoli force their opponents to concede a corner.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid) takes a short pass from Jude Bellingham in his stride in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes an unstoppable shot into the bottom right corner. 1:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes a short pass from [PLAYER] in his stride in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes an unstoppable shot into the bottom right corner. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Eduardo Camavinga (Real Madrid) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Clement Turpin had an easy-decision to make.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is booked after bringing down an opponent. [REFEREE] had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner which is cleared.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Eduardo Camavinga slips a clever pass through to Jude Bellingham (Real Madrid), who moves inside the box and sends a measured shot beyond the keeper and into the bottom right corner. 1:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] slips a clever pass through to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who moves inside the box and sends a measured shot beyond the keeper and into the bottom right corner. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

comments.comments_text: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Napoli) swings the ball into the box from the corner kick but it's a bit too strong and it goes out of play.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings the ball into the box from the corner kick but it's a bit too strong and it goes out of play.

comments.comments_text: Matteo Politano (Napoli) fails to produce a decent cross from the corner kick. The ball goes well out of play. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Real Madrid.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) fails to produce a decent cross from the corner kick. The ball goes well out of play. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) brilliantly executes a penalty kick as he sends the ball straight into the bottom left corner, bouncing in off the post. No chance for Kepa Arrizabalaga to stop this shot.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Jude Bellingham (Real Madrid) was quite harsh and Clement Turpin didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
